survey_response.review_text:
I have been a regular visitor of Dr Hussain and trust his medicines. But of lately I have seen a trend in doctors of Apollo Hospital to suggest every patient a series of tests to come to a conclusion.
In past 3 months every member of my family who has visited Apollo were given the same set of tests - like Dengue, every possible blood test and so on..
Not to mention the price of almost every test lies in the rage of 1000₹ which altogether burn a hole in patient’s pocket.
To me a good doctor is someone who doesn’t suggests patients all sorts of tests in a hit and try way to come to a conclusion about a patients disease..
I know this review won’t make any change in the ongoing practice but would like the patients to be more informed and choose a doctor wisely..

Visited the doctor for a fever. Since dengue was so common, I thought he will be suggesting for a test since I had little shivering. But he explained me and he told if fever didn't go off within a day, we can proceed. Wait time is bill when I visited ! aNd very friendly too.
He's humble, professional and treats well, no bad attitude. He generously ask for symtoms and listened properly what i explained. It's been a good experience.

***** *** ** ********* ***** ** ******* ***** ** ***** **** **** ****** ** ********* *************** *** ****** ***** *** **** ** *** ***** ***** ** ****** Not satisfied with the prescription for tests of all types fevers such as CBP, Widal, Typhoid, Dengue  at a go. Not satisfied .
Doctor is very friendly and explain the issue carefully and most importantly listen to the patient and then prescribe medicine. The way he talks and explains make you feel good.
Very nice Doctor, listens patiently and suggests the treatment after careful considerations. Takes care of patients needs.
Very patient, appreciative *** ************* doctor. Listened and then helped provide a logical medical diagnosis.

Very friendly and his approach is also very good. Clearly explaining the problem and very positive approach. I would highly recommend him

- Manikandan G
I like the way he explains. He is easy to talk. And a good listener, for a patient that's really important.
The way he understands the patient is remarkable. The treatment plan is outstanding. you feel safe no matter what ur health condition is as you know you will be well treated.

I have been a regular visitor of Dr Hussain and trust his medicines. But of lately I have seen a trend in doctors of Apollo Hospital to suggest every patient a series of tests to come to a conclusion.
In past 3 months every member of my family who has visited Apollo were given the same set of tests - like Dengue, every possible blood test and so on..
Not to mention the price of almost every test lies in the rage of 1000₹ which altogether burn a hole in patient’s pocket.
To me a good doctor is someone who doesn’t suggests patients all sorts of tests in a hit and try way to come to a conclusion about a patients disease..
I know this review won’t make any change in the ongoing practice but would like the patients to be more informed and choose a doctor wisely..

He's humble, professional and treats well, no bad attitude. He generously ask for symtoms and listened properly what i explained. It's been a good experience.

***** *** ** ********* ***** ** ******* ***** ** ***** **** **** ****** ** ********* *************** *** ****** ***** *** **** ** *** ***** ***** ** ****** Not satisfied with the prescription for tests of all types fevers such as CBP, Widal, Typhoid, Dengue  at a go. Not satisfied .

Very nice Doctor, listens patiently and suggests the treatment after careful considerations. Takes care of patients needs.
Very patient, appreciative *** ************* doctor. Listened and then helped provide a logical medical diagnosis.

Very friendly and his approach is also very good. Clearly explaining the problem and very positive approach. I would highly recommend him

- Manikandan G
I like the way he explains. He is easy to talk. And a good listener, for a patient that's really important.
The way he understands the patient is remarkable. The treatment plan is outstanding. you feel safe no matter what ur health condition is as you know you will be well treated.
Doctor is a pleasant persona. He was patient enough to listen to the issue and gave *********** medications. thank you doctor
Doctor is experienced, quite friendly, gave his time to explain the issue. **** ****** ** ******* *****
When the doctor knew I have come to visit based on the preventative health check up report; the doctor seems to not too bothered *** ******** **** ******* ******** ** *** *** **********
Doctor was not serious. I explained the medical condition of my mother and the reports. But he was least interested and proposed to visit another specialist in Apollo jubilee hills.

I went for viral fever treatment.. i was suspecting malaria/typhoid but he checked properly and gave good medicine.. after 2 dosages i am fine.. Very friendly attitude while discuss the problem, recommended.
Great Dr.. Definitely recommend......... He recommends less medicine and explain everything and provide solutions
Dr Syed checks the patient thoroughly and the explanation about the further steps are reliable.  If I further need to consult any doctor I would visit Dr Syed.

My family and I have been consulting Dr. Syed Athar for last 3-4 years now. Excellent doctor in terms of diagnosis and gives only relevent medicines now. He is really calm and composed and understands the problems well.

I have visited doctor several times for varied medical issues for all my family members. Everytime I find his diagnosis spot on, without many tests. He is friendly and understands the problem. I found him most trusted doctor in Apollo.

The doctor was not ready to accept the investigation reports from outside. After getting the report twice from outside, we ended up with no conclusion on the issue.  Finally we consulted a different doctor.

i have been consulting Dr Husaain from last one year. He is very experienced doctor and at the same time calm and Polite. I had sinusitis and post the treatment i never had it. It's been almost 6 month's now post the treatment. Also he helped me with gastric issues and I'm doing pretty well. Thanks doc

he will go through the end of the problem and then explain it in such a simple way where patient get relaxed of their illness. He gave ample of time to hear your problems out properly. ** *********** ***** *** *********** **** ***** *** ******** *** *** ******** Thank you doc.

My experience was nice. Dr. Dyed was cool and compose, patiently listened to my medication history and gave simple treatment. Hopefully I should be OK post 3 course of days. ** ***** * **** ******* ********** I will recommend people for his medication.
Doctor was good.... But you showing consultant fees 550.. hospital reception person taken 700/-......

Very nice and cordial.
Explained my situation, and made me comfortable.********** ******* 
Very happy with his service.
Doc is very patient. He listens to our problems. The most important factor which a doctor needs to fulfil is to provide positive vibes to the patient and he knows how to do it.

Doctor sir well experienced & nicely discussed with patient in friendly manner and given necessary medicines. He was advised good habbilts what to do & not to do. Taken good care.

I strongly recommend this Doctor.
Doctor is nice he is listioning my problem and gave medicine today onwards I start medicines. I want to see how medicine will work
This was my second visit to the doctor, he explains the problem and it needs to be treated. Am very much satisfied with the treatment. The approach makes you feel strong
Doctor is very friendly. ** *********** *************** He asked to do the exact investigation related to health issue.
